content.p: You are enjoying a sugar-free dark chocolate yogurt smoothie. You read the food label to see that it contains aspartame, glutamine, xantheose from the cacao plant, citric acid and sodium benzoate as a preservative. Complete this paragraph by identifying which taste receptor is stimulated by each ingredient.

question.body: The aspartame, glutamine and xantheose will all bind to a G-protein coupled receptor. The asparatem will stimulate receptors, while the glutamine will stimulate receptors and xanteose will stimulate receptors. The two preservative chemicals will dissociate and create a concentration gradient, with sodium benzoate stimulating your receptors and citric acid stimulating your receptors.
